display.title: UHC Control v1.0.0
display.description: §3This pack allows the configuration of a UHC. To set up the pack use §d/function uhc:setup§3 and use the book to configure the options. To safely uninstall the pack use §d/function uhc:uninstall§3. To stop a UHC mid-game use §d/function uhc:stop§3. Please note that the UHC cannot be resumed.
